record.dc:title: Dinner on the grounds
record.dc:description: Photographer identifies several people with arrows. Those identified are, from left to right, Mr. Steve Whaley in charge of fair, Abbie Runyan, Emily Burton, Miss Whittle Sevier County Agent. Note the six-room schoolhouse (ca. 1914) is in the background. The photographer was facing southeast.
record.dc:subject: People
Fairs
Six-Room Schoolhouse, Gatlinburg
